page.title: 10A Mixed Farm near Combwich.
page.content: Lower Hill Farm is a mixed farm. There are 24 fields and 240 acres.The farm is owned by{Mr.Page}Most of it is grass but some of it is oats,barley, fodder and a few turnips.The grass is used for grazing,hay and sileage.There are 2 bulls on the farm.One of them is a Friesian pedigree,he was kept since he was 2 weeks old.The other bull is a Hereford.They have 80 milking cows and each cow gives 5 gallons a day.There are 4 tractors,digger,haybob,bailer, dungspreader,hay elevator,disc harrow, roller,plough,2 disc mowers,hay turner hedge trimmer,seed sower,sprayer,3 hay trailers and a baleslave.They have 2 old tractors as well.There are 20 hens and a few cockerels.There are 60 to 70 beef cattle and they are sold at 2 to 2 and a half years old at Â£500 to Â£550.They have got 2 pigs,60 to 70 sheep and 1 ram.They have an orchard.
